content: That's really helpful, thanks! I'll definitely check out those ramen shops. I'm particularly interested in trying the rich tonkotsu broth at Ramen Koji and Ramen Toraji. By the way, do you have any recommendations for must-visit temples or shrines in Kyoto? I've heard that Fushimi Inari shrine is a must-see, but I'm not sure what else to prioritize.
